html:
LCD Soundsystem and Pulp will co-headline two Hollywood Bowl shows in the autumn. The Los Angeles concerts are set for Thursday, September 25, and Friday, September 26. It’s a reunion for James Murphy and Jarvis Cocker after they worked together, over a decade ago, on “After You.” See LCD Soundsystem and Pulp’s respective tour dates below.

LCD Soundsystem have been playing shows regularly and are “getting closer and closer to” finishing their fifth studio album, the highly anticipated follow-up to the 2017 comeback effort American Dream. A new song from the band, “X-Ray Eyes,” landed last year.

Pulp returned to North America, in 2024, for their first proper tour of the continent since 2012. They’ve not released a new album since 2001’s We Love Life.
